controllers
Class HomeController

java.lang.Object
  controllers.HomeController

@Component
@Controller
public class HomeController
extends java.lang.Object

The Home controller handles log on, log off, change password, choosing themes, and sending requests to admins for faults and other things

Author:
anthony.garo
